overview:
As a senior at Brandeis University, Adam Gries co-founded NishNash, a website for restaurants (including ordering online) with a mechanical turk style backend to collect and digitize restaurant information. NishNash was sold to diningin.com in May of 2007.

After the sale Adam built “I am Hungry”, one of the first successful applications on the facebook platform, later built Naughty Gifts (4 million users) and co-founded Social Dynamics, a social application company. Social Dynamics was sold to SGN in 2008, and Adam worked there as a software engineer for the best part of 2008.

Since then Adam co-founded Social Expeditions, a social media production company which has created applications such as Photo of the Day (facebook), How Well Do They Know Me (myspace) and Tap Quest (iphone).
